LP : Is there a reception ? @ G ( LP , go-to ( reception ) ) ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . src: LP : Hello ARI . ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? LP : Ask how ... [start] RC : Hello . I 'd like to have a small meal , can you tell me where we should go ? [MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] RC : Can you tell me when the cafeteria opens ? [MASK] ARI : From 11 AM to 4 PM . [MASK] RC : From 11 AM to 4 PM , is that right ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , you 're right . [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . RC : Is the cafeteria wheelchair accessible ? Because my friend is in a wheelchair and he ca n't get around by himself . [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Hmm , ARI , could you tell me how to get to the cafeteria ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : ARI , could you tell me if my appointment is at 11 AM ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . LP : He might know how to get there . LP : Can you tell me how to get to the reception ? [MASK] ARI : The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . [MASK] RC : Ah , thank you . [MASK] LP : It 's quite simple . Thank you ARI . [end] ARI : You 're welcome . I 'm here to answer your questions . LP : It would be nice if we knew how to take the lift . LP : ARI , could you tell us how to get to the lift ? @ G ( LP+RC , go-to ( lifts ) ) ARI : The lifts are at the entrance on the left . @ AG ( LP+RC , go-to ( lifts ) ) LP : Do these lifts take us to the cafeteria , or do we have to take something else ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . RC : Is the cafeteria on the ground floor ? @ G ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) ARI : Yes , you 're right . RC : So we do n't have to take the lift to get to the cafeteria ? ARI : No , you do not . RC : Thank you . LP : Thank you very much ARI . ARI : You 're welcome , thank you , see you later and have a nice day .

src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? RC : Hello ARI . LP : I need to go to room 17 for treatment . So , I do n't know how to get to room 17 . [MASK] RC : ARI , could you please tell us how to get to room 17 ? For a ... [MASK] ARI : Yes . You continue along the building , take the lift and it 's on the second floor . [MASK] RC : Ok. And is it on the left or the right ... on the second floor ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . RC : Ok . The reception is on the ground floor , is that right ? [MASK] ARI : Yes . Absolutely . [MASK] LP : Are we , are we expected in room 17 ? Is there someone who will see us or guide us ? RC : Yes , do you know if there is someone who will come and welcome us to room 17 ? And what paperwork do we need to provide ? ARI : I 'll call a nurse to find out . Sorry , I do n't have this information . RC : Ok , thank you , I 'll wait for you to call the nurse then . ARI : Yes . RC : Can I sit somewhere with my husband while I wait ? [MASK] ARI : Yes . Of course . [MASK] LP : I have an appointment at 12.30 PM , is it going ahead ? I 'm not late or too early ? RC : Um , we have ... ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . RC : I 'm the one you have to talk to because if not ... LP : I have an appointment at 12.30 PM . Will there be any delay ? [end] RC : Um hello , we would like to know if there is a delay to welcome us to room 17 , we have an appointment in room 17 . ARI : No . RC : Because we have another appointment later in another department . ARI : Yes . Of course . You have to go to the reception . RC : Ok , thank you . ARI : Thank you . See you soon . Have a nice day .
